PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-04062020-05-30,  ,  ,  ,  TC,  CTA
ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectAccessible Transportation for Persons with Disabilities Regulations Applications Exemption Order
PrecisACCESSIBLE TRANSPORTATION FOR PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES REGULATIONS (ATPDR) APLICATION EXEMPTION ORDER in order to provide additional time for transportation service providers to come into compliance with certain requirements of the ATPDR in light of the severe financial and operational disruptions they have experienced as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0125 Publication Date: 2020-06-10
AttachmentsAttachment
